FuncDef: This command configures the rate for Internet Control Message Protocol version 6 (ICMPv6) packet-too-big messages.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the number of packet-too-big messages to send in the time frame specified by the seconds parameter. Values-10 to 1000. ParamDefault: Default- 100
Specifies the time frame, in seconds, that is used to limit the number of packet-too-big messages issued. Values-1 to 60. ParamDefault: Default- 10
